Text: Been looking for a version with subtitles for long, shame this one doesn't have em:(
very sorry man. the actual dvd didn't even have any!

@omegafox84

I see that you mention this doesn't have subtitle but wonder does it have closed caption instead?
ah, good thinking. indeed it does. i just checked it out and the closed caption can be used in place of the missing subtitles. thanks for pointing that out!

That good to know it has CC.

@raththesh: i have no particular order when uploading. i've been waiting to see if some of these problems TPB has been experiencing lately are fixed before uploading anything else. from what i read though, it may be some time until the edit feature is fixed. also, i never remove anything unless it's necessary.
